      • toJson

        public static org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset<String> toJson(org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset<org.apache.spark.sql.Row> dataset,
                                                          String resourceTypeUrl)
        Converts a set of FHIR resources to JSON.
        Parameters:
        dataset - a dataset containing FHIR resources
        resourceTypeUrl - the FHIR resource type
        Returns:
        a dataset of JSON strings for the FHIR resources

      • toBundle

        public static org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.model.Bundle toBundle(org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset<org.apache.spark.sql.Row> dataset,
                                                       String resourceTypeUrl)
        Returns a bundle containing all resources in the dataset. This should be used with caution for large datasets, since the returned bundle will include all data.
        Parameters:
        dataset - a dataset of FHIR resoruces
        resourceTypeUrl - the FHIR resource type
        Returns:
        a bundle containing those resources.

      • toJsonBundle

        public static String toJsonBundle(org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset<org.apache.spark.sql.Row> dataset,
                                  String resourceTypeUrl)
        Returns a JSON string representing the resources as a bundle. This should be used with caution for large datasets, since the returned string will include all data.
        Parameters:
        dataset - a dataset of FHIR resources.
        resourceTypeUrl - the URL of the FHIR resource type contained in the dataset.
        Returns:
        A string containing the JSON representation of the bundle.

      • resourceToXml

        public static String resourceToXml(org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.model.Resource resource)
        Converts a resource to its XML representation.
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource
        Returns:
        a string containing XML for the resource.
